title: A Message in the Night
description: A dead Gorumite asks for help with his dying breath; Iron Harbor is in danger.

title: Elder Ordwi Found
description: The party finds Elder Ordwi

title: Xar-Azmak Defeated
description: Party arrives in Dis, Hell

title: Blu's Birthday
description: A foundling raised by an order of monks, Blu's real birthdate is unknown. But on this day years ago, an Automaton delivered the child to the Order of the Platinum Band.

title: Ritual of the Whip Sting
description: Calistrian day of vengeance. Any revenge taken on this day must be put fully to rest.

title: Feast of Vigor
description: A communal, hedonistic celebration of pleasure.

title: Merrymead
description: Merrymead was started by Druma's Caydenites, who had the brilliant idea to host a massive party to drink the remains of the previous year's alcohol in a symbolic act of drowning unfinished business.

title: Day of Bones
description: Priests and worshipers of the Lady of Graves parade the bodies of the recently dead on this holiday, holding free burials afterwards.

title: Firstbloom
description: Firstbloom is a holiday celebrating the first planting of the agricultural season, and generally associated with the weather god Gozreh. It falls on the vernal equinox.

title: Currentseve
description: A somber festival, it was started by sailors seeking the protection of Gozreh, deity of storms, to ensure safe voyages as the spring fishing ventures began their preparations.

title: Ascendance Night
description: A holiday comemorating the asccendance of Norgorber to Godhood.

title: First Brewing
description: Cayden's priests use this holiday to bless the year's harvest of brewing crops and reflect on the hard work of the Accidental God's devotees.

title: Day of the Inheritor
description: A holiday commemorating the church of Iomedae's adoption of the forlorn faithful of the dead god Aroden into their midst.

title: Swallowtail Festival
description: Priests of Desna release a wagon full of swallowtail butterflies in front of a crowd of believers. Worshipers consider it a good omen if a butterfly rests on him or her for a short time. The remainder of the day is spent in celebration and can include activities such as feasting, storytelling, and singing.

title: Ascendance Day
description: Holiday marking the ascension of the goddess Iomedae after taking the Test of the Starstone.

title: Allbrith
description: What was once a day of bloodcurdling ritualistic sacrifice has become a day of temptation and celebration, ever since the half-orcs and Goblins of Katapesh popularized the celebration of the Demon Queen Lamashtu with secretive masquerades.

name: Festival of Making and Breaking
description: Artisans teach children to build something which, come evening, is then destroyed by teachers of magic in a vibrant elemental display.

title: Abjurant Day
description: Nethysian holiday devoted to magical protection and securing that which is dear to you.

title: Evoking Day
description: Holiday marked by displays of fireworks and magical duels (both mock and real).

title: Transmutatum
description: Holiday celebrating transformation, both magical and metaphysical.
